name: HANCHO (itch)
description:
HANCHO is a turn-based RPG operating system that allows you to build and battle teams composed of real-world professionals! 

Inspired by online battle systems like Pokemon Showdown, HANCHO puts you in the manager's shoes and lets you customize every detail of your team and its members. After creating the perfect team, jump into training to test them against AI opponents, or go online to battle against your peers!
